languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, я ни на йоту не сомневаюсь в ваших силах, но настаиваю, что вам следует воздержаться от неоправданного риска".
"Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, я ни на йоту не сомневаюсь в ваших силах, но настаиваю, что вам следует воздержаться от неоправданного риска".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."
"Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."
"Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."
"Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."
"Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."
"Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, no dudo ni por un instante de sus poderes, pero insisto en que evite este riesgo innecesario».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, no dudo ni por un instante de sus poderes, pero insisto en que evite este riesgo innecesario».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの力を疑うつもりは微塵もありませんが、このような不必要なリスクを冒すことはお控えください」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの力を疑うつもりは微塵もありませんが、このような不必要なリスクを冒すことはお控えください」

languages.text: “舰长大人，我对您的力量没有一丝怀疑，但我坚决要求您别冒这个没必要冒的险。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我对您的力量没有一丝怀疑，但我坚决要求您别冒这个没必要冒的险。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich zweifle keinen Augenblick lang an Euren Fähigkeiten, doch ich muss darauf bestehen, dass Ihr davon abseht, dieses unnötige Risiko einzugehen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich zweifle keinen Augenblick lang an Euren Fähigkeiten, doch ich muss darauf bestehen, dass Ihr davon abseht, dieses unnötige Risiko einzugehen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je ne doute pas un seul instant des pouvoirs qui sont les vôtres, mais j'insiste pour que vous évitiez de prendre des risques inconsidérés. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je ne doute pas un seul instant des pouvoirs qui sont les vôtres, mais j'insiste pour que vous évitiez de prendre des risques inconsidérés. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, güçlerinizden bir an olsun kuşku duymuyorum. Ancak gereksiz risk almaktan sakınmanızda ısrar ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I do not for a moment doubt your powers, but I insist that you refrain from taking this unnecessary risk."
